statements: SELECT * FROM equipment_health_monitoring
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name FROM equipment_health_monitoring
SELECT location, value FROM equipment_health_monitoring WHERE sensor_id = 2
SELECT sensor_name, reading_timestamp FROM equipment_health_monitoring ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC
SELECT sensor_id, value FROM equipment_health_monitoring WHERE value > 50
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name FROM equipment_health_monitoring WHERE location = 'Room A' ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM equipment_health_monitoring WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY sensor_name ASC, reading_timestamp DESC
SELECT sensor_id, location, reading_timestamp FROM equipment_health_monitoring WHERE sensor_name LIKE '%Temperature%' AND value BETWEEN 50 AND 80 ORDER BY location, reading_timestamp ASC
SELECT sensor_name, value FROM equipment_health_monitoring WHERE value < 50 OR (location = 'Server Room' AND reading_timestamp >= '2022-01-01') ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM equipment_health_monitoring ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature Sensor';
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(data_value) AS average_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING average_value > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(log_id) AS num_logs FROM sensor_logs GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY num_logs DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(installation_date, INTERVAL 1 YEAR), '%Y-%m-%d') AS next_inspection_date FROM sensors;
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC, sensor_name ASC
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature'
SELECT sensor_name, location, installation_date FROM sensors WHERE location LIKE '%Room%'
SELECT sensor_name, AVG(data_value) AS average_value FROM sensors INNER JOIN sensor_data ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id GROUP BY sensor_name
SELECT sensor_name, log_message, log_timestamp FROM sensors INNER JOIN sensor_logs ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_logs.sensor_id ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM Equipment;
SELECT id, name, location FROM Equipment ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT type, status FROM Sensor WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, value FROM SensorData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM Equipment WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, type, status, equipment_id FROM Sensor WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT id, timestamp, value FROM SensorData WHERE value > 50;
SELECT * FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sensors
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM Sensors
SELECT type, location, last_reading FROM Sensors
SELECT * FROM Readings
SELECT sensor_id, value, timestamp FROM Readings
SELECT * FROM Sensors WHERE type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT location, type, last_reading FROM Sensors WHERE last_reading >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_reading DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, type FROM Sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, location, type FROM Sensors WHERE location LIKE 'Room%' AND type = 'Humidity';
SELECT sensor_id, type, COUNT(*) AS total_readings FROM Readings GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 100 ORDER BY total_readings DESC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM Equipment;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_name FROM Sensor ORDER BY sensor_type DESC;
SELECT data_id, sensor_id, data_value, timestamp FROM SensorData WHERE data_value > 100;
SELECT performance_metric, value FROM PerformanceData WHERE equipment_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Sensor WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, data_value, timestamp FROM SensorData WHERE data_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, performance_metric, value FROM PerformanceData JOIN Equipment ON PerformanceData.equipment_id = Equipment.equipment_id WHERE value < 50;
